record.field: Net Income or loss for the period
Net income or loss on ordinary activities after tax
Net income or loss on ordinary activities before tax

MT_sale_goods_services.balance + MT_income_invest.balance + MT_commission_income.balance +MT_rental_income.balance + MT_amount_non_profit.balance + MT_realised_gains_loss.balance + MT_other_income.balance
Sale of goods and rendering of services
Amounts received by non-profit making organisations [NPOs]
Realised Gains or losses on disposal of fixed assets

MT_advertising_promotion.balance + MT_wages_salaries_employee.balance + MT_subcontracting_outsourcing.balance + MT_travel_expenses.balance + MT_insurance.balance + MT_office_expenses.balance + MT_professional_fees.balance + MT_licences_permits_membership.balance + MT_rental.balance + MT_repairs_maintenance.balance + MT_supplies.balance + MT_utilities.balance + MT_interest_bank_charges.balance + MT_provisions.balance + MT_amortisation_intangible.balance + MT_depreciation_immovable_property.balance + MT_depreciation_wasting_assets.balance + MT_depreciation_tangible_assets.balance + MT_other_expenses.balance
